edge_1: Starman by David Bowie is included in the soundtrack of The Martian.
edge_2: Harry Gregson-Williams composed the score for The Martian. It is the fourth collaboration between Gregson-Williams and Scott. Gregson-Williams previously worked on music for Scott's films Kingdom of Heaven (2005), Prometheus (2012) and Exodus: Gods and Kings, composing the main film score for the first and last films, and doing additional music for the other two.

edge_1: Starman by David Bowie is included in the soundtrack of The Martian.
edge_2: Waterloo by ABBA is included in the soundtrack of The Martian.

edge_1: Starman by David Bowie is included in the soundtrack of The Martian.
edge_2: I Will Survive by Gloria Gaynor is played during the closing credits of The Martian.
